 2017-15032017-12-01,  ,  ,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) assist in the maintenance of an effective enforcement regime; (2) promote the viable and effective use of Canadian waters; and (3) increase safety for all boaters.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0261 Publication Date: 2017-12-13
